company: Jacques Marchais Museum of Tibetan Art
title: Volunteer
description: Jacques Marchais Museum of Tibetan Art is located in Staten Island, New York. It is home to one of the most extensive collections of Himalayan artifacts. It is a uniquely peaceful retreat that features a beautiful garden. During my time at the museum, I helped maintain the garden and artifacts. Additionally, I photographed the Tibetan showcases for archival purposes.

title: Volunteer
description: As a volunteer at the Staten Island Hindu Temple, I help set up the dining room and serve food to templegoers. Additionally, I assist in setting and cleaning up services at the temple.
